name: Let Jack protect you Online Trivia | Authors | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
firefighter.

	Jack O'Malley is the youngest O'Malley brother.

questions.text: When did Jack decide what he wanted to do for a living?
questions.explanation:
when he was a kid.

	When Jack was a child, his room caught on fire. After that he wanted to become a firefighter because he liked the mystery of a fire.

questions.text: Who was the female firefighter that was burned in a nursing home fire?
questions.explanation:
Cassie.

	Cassie was burned over most of her body when she and her partner got caught in a nursing home fire after Cassie went in to retrieve her tenth patient.

questions.text: What was the name of Rachel's friend that Jack couldn't get to in a fire?
questions.explanation:
Tabitha.

	Jack's sister Rachel had two friends named Tabitha and Gage. Jack and his team were late to a fire in their house and Tabitha got caught inside. Jack couldn't get her out and Gage has hated him ever since. Jack feels bad because he couldn't get Tabitha out; he found out later that she had been pregnant.

Gold.

	Jack works the gold shift. All the fires are set around his shift, leading them to believe that someone is out to get Jack.

questions.text: Which sister called Jack on their emergency page?
questions.explanation:
Jennifer.

	Jennifer called Jack from Houston after she fell down four stairs, through the bannister and into the basement. A frantic Jack got his boss, Cole, to call Houston dispatch and her husband Tom while he kept Jennifer talking on his phone. Later, Cassie told Jack that Jennifer knew exactly who she was calling when she called him.

questions.text: Cassie's partner, Ash, told her he was setting the fires.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Ash returned, but it was to spend Christmas with Cassie. He had nothing to do with the fires.

questions.text: What did Jack name the cat he got Cassie as a Christmas present?
questions.explanation:
Benji.

	T.J. is the mouse that lives in Cassie's apartment, J.J. is the fake mouse that Jack uses as a prank, and Precious is Marcus' nickname for Jennifer.

No.

	Due to the nursing home fire in which Cassie was severely burned, she is now partially (not completely) deaf.

questions.text: Cassie ended up moving out of her apartment because of the mouse.
questions.explanation:
No.

	The whole O'Malley family gathered to completely redo Cassie's old apartment so that it looked brand new.
